extends GridCacheConcurrentMapImpl
implements Comparable<GridDhtLocalPartition>, GridReservable

      • rent

        public IgniteInternalFuture<?> rent(boolean updateSeq)
        Initiates partition eviction process. If partition has reservations, eviction will be delayed and continued after all reservations will be released.
        Parameters:
        updateSeq - If true topology update sequence will be updated after eviction is finished.
        Returns:
        Future to signal that this node is no longer an owner or backup.

      • clearAsync

        public void clearAsync()
        Initiates single clear process if partition is in MOVING state. Method does nothing if clear process is already running.

      • markForDestroy

        public boolean markForDestroy()
        Returns:
        True if partition is safe to destroy.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys partition data store and invokes appropriate callbacks.

      • awaitDestroy

        public void awaitDestroy()
        Awaits completion of partition destroy process in case of EVICTED partition state.

      • onClearFinished

        public void onClearFinished(IgniteInClosure<? super IgniteInternalFuture<?>> lsnr)
        Adds listener on clearFuture finish.
        Parameters:
        lsnr - Listener.

      • isClearing

        public boolean isClearing()
        Returns:
        True if clearing process is running at the moment on the partition.

      • tryClear

        public boolean tryClear(EvictionContext evictionCtx)
                 throws NodeStoppingException
        Tries to start partition clear process clearAll(EvictionContext)). Only one thread is allowed to do such process concurrently. At the end of clearing method completes clearFuture.
        Returns:
        false if clearing is not started due to existing reservations.
        Throws:
        NodeStoppingException - If node is stopping.

      • primary

        public boolean primary(AffinityTopologyVersion topVer)
        Parameters:
        topVer - Topology version.
        Returns:
        True if local node is primary for this partition.

      • backup

        public boolean backup(AffinityTopologyVersion topVer)
        Parameters:
        topVer - Topology version.
        Returns:
        True if local node is backup for this partition.
